titles: A proclamation by his Excellency the Lord Generall, for the regulating of souldiers in their march to Ireland.
author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.

notes: Signed and dated at end: T. Fairfax. 17 March 1648.
